Bink SDK 1.7b

Distributing Bink on GNU/Linux

Discussion

To distribute an application that uses Bink, you don't have to include anything other than your application and the Bink movies that you want to play. Bink is supplied as a static library that is linked directly into your application, so nothing else is required.
